    com.jfx  

    • Uses of MarketInfo in com.jfx

      Fields in com.jfx declared as MarketInfo 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_ASK
      Last incoming ask price.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_BID
      Last incoming bid price.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_DIGITS
      Count of digits after decimal point in the symbol prices.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_EXPIRATION
      Market expiration date (usually used for futures).
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_FREEZELEVEL
      Order freeze level in points.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_HIGH
      High day price.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_LOTSIZE
      Lot size in the base currency.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_LOTSTEP
      Step for changing lots.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_LOW
      Low day price.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MARGINCALCMODE
      Margin calculation mode.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MARGINHEDGED
      Hedged margin calculated for 1 lot.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MARGININIT
      Initial margin requirements for 1 lot.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MARGINMAINTENANCE
      Margin to maintain open positions calculated for 1 lot.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MARGINREQUIRED
      Free margin required to open 1 lot for buying.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MAXLOT
      Maximum permitted amount of a lot.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_MINLOT
      Minimum permitted amount of a lot.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_POINT
      Point size in the quote currency.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_PROFITCALCMODE
      Profit calculation mode.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_SPREAD
      Spread value in points.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_STARTING
      Market starting date (usually used for futures).
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_STOPLEVEL
      Stop level in points.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_SWAPLONG
      Swap of the long position.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_SWAPSHORT
      Swap of the short position.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_SWAPTYPE
      Swap calculation method.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_TICKSIZE
      Tick size in the quote currency.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_TICKVALUE
      Tick value in the deposit currency.
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_TIME
      The last incoming tick time (last known server time).
      static MarketInfo MarketInfo.MODE_TRADEALLOWED
      Trade is allowed for the symbol.
